pages.text: These are all of the recipe changes pertaining to Botania.

$(li)Added Cyan Pigment, Light Blue Pigment, and Storm Stone to Orechid.$(li)Corporea Spark needs Quitoxic Powder instead of Ender Air.$(li)The Runic Altar must be made in the Spectrum Focus with 2 C and 4 Y, and additionally requires a Lime Pigment.$(li)Elven Portal Core requires 2 Elementium Nuggets and an Onyx Shard instead of 3 Terrasteel Nuggets.
$(li)Added a lategame recipe for Gaia Spirits that bypasses the bossfight entirely.$(li)Added a midgame recipe for getting Elementium before opening the elven portal.
